docs.title: The Cask Book
docs.text: Cask is the C++ package manager. Cask downloads your C++ package’s dependencies, and compiles your packages. You can contribute to this book on GitHub.

docs.title: 1. Getting Started
docs.text:
To get started with Cask, install Cask (and CMake) and set up your first project.

  • Installation
  • First steps with Cargo

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: asdasd Cask is the C++ package manager. Cask downloads your C++ package’s dependencies, and compiles your packages. You can contribute to this book on GitHub.
